== Who I am ==
''I am 26 year old software developer from India, Kerala. I started my c programming from 10 std onwards and completed B. Tech in electronics and communication engineering from Govt college of engineering Kannur ,India, Kerala in 2013 and currently i am working in a private company more than 2.5 years in server BMC firmware development mainly concentrating in kernel(5.4XX) and Debian buster target related work. I also have open source project in GitHub, i created a minimal Linux live os (link: https://github.com/arjuncr) also have one web site: https://www.acrlinux.com/ now i am thinking to contribute to ubuntu core-dev because i am using ubuntu more than 9 years. ''

== My Ubuntu story ==
''I discovered ubuntu in school days in 2009, after that i tried a lot of Linux distros but i felt ubuntu is more stable and user friendly so currently in my laptop i am using ubuntu as primary os because i can do what ever i need with ubuntu also i can explore the max power of my pc.''
